document.full_text: world number four victoria azarenka of belarus smoothly advanced into the french open quarter-finals with a 6-2 6-3 win over russian ekaterina makarova on monday.
document.title: azarenka eases into last eight at roland garros
lines_and_colors: world number four victoria azarenka of belarus smoothly advanced into the french open quarter-finals with a 6-2 6-3 win over russian ekaterina makarova on monday.
